notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: Yao Zhao, Zhen Zhou, Pan Zhang and Yuxia Cui conceived and designed the study. Zhen Zhou, Pan Zhang, Yuxia Cui, Yongbo Zhang, Xian Qin and Rongpei Li performed the experiments. Zhen Zhou, Pan Zhang, Yuxia Cui, Ping Liu, Ying Dou and Lijia Wang analysed and interpreted the data. Zhen Zhou and Pan Zhang wrote the manuscript. Yao Zhao supervised the project. The manuscript was proofread by Yao Zhao. All authors approved the final version of the article, including the authorship list.
